column2: "The ARKS Code is fairly verbose, so here is the deal with the level cap."
"As there are strong and weak ARKS ops, there's strong and weak hostiles too. When a weak goes against a strong hostile, the results aren't pretty."
"To prevent such a bloodbath, officers like me guide you to areas where you'll encounter hostiles suited to your abilities. "
"That said, if you prove you can easily clear the quest, I can lift your difficulty cap so you can go against hostiles better matched to your strength."
"Whether or not you take this test is completely up to you. My job is merely to evaluate your performance."
